oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Snow Benefit at the Grand Ole Opry - Year 5 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of the Hank Snow Benefit Concert at the Grand Ole Opry. The segment is hosted by T. Tommy Cutrer (musician) and features performances by: Melvin Sloan (musician), the Tennessee Travelers (musical group/dance group), Hank Snow (musician) and Marty Roberts (musician). The recording is from an unidentified date. The tape is identified as the fifth year of the program. The tape is part one of three.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Melvin Sloan and the Tennessee Travelers; Hank Snow; Marty Roberts
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:11) T. Tommy Cutrer introduces reverend Jimmie Rodgers Snow; additionally, Snow leads the audience in prayer -- (01:14) Cutrer introduces the show cause: child abuse prevention; moreover, Cutrer introduces the Grand Ole Opry Staff Band and Melvin Sloan's Dancers -- (04:01) Unidentified tune (Grand Ole Opry Staff Band) -- (05:40) Cutrer reviews the structure of the show and introduces Hank Snow -- (06:17) I'm Movin' on (Hank Snow) -- (09:00) Snow greets the audience and introduces the show -- (10:57) Storms Never Last (Hank Snow) -- (15:05) Forever and One Day (Hank Snow) -- (17:28) Snow jokes about the energy of the crowd and reflects on the international success of Jimmie Rodgers -- (18:20) Waiting for a Train (Hank Snow) -- (20:46) Snow introduces the members of his band -- (21:37) The Bells of St. Mary's (Hank Snow) -- (23:58) Snow reveals the issues on stage -- (25:02) She Wears My Ring (Hank Snow) -- (28:15) Caribbean (Hank Snow) -- (31:00) Snow reflects on the large number of songs he has received -- (32:20) The Letter (Hank Snow) -- (35:28) Snow reflects on the message of ""The Letter"" -- (36:34) Tammy [instrumental] (Hank Snow) -- (40:26) Wheels (Hank Snow) -- (42:45) Snow introduces Marty Roberts -- (44:41) Little Buddy (Hank Snow and Marty Roberts) -- (48:52) Snow praises Roberts -- (49:30) Little Grass Shack [incomplete] (Hank Snow and Marty Roberts)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Sloan, Melvin; Melvin Sloan and the Tennessee Travelers; Snow, Hank; Roberts, Martin;
